languages.text: "Ваш кормчий, Равор, между делом провел меня по палубам. Великолепный у вас корабль — "Страж Бездны" с ним рядом не стоял. Но я все равно скучаю по той старой посудине..."
"Your helmsman, Ravor, showed me around the decks in his spare time. A wonderful voidship you have — the Watchman of the Abyss couldn't hold a candle to it. I still miss that old rig though..."
languages.original_text: "Ваш кормчий, Равор, между делом провел меня по палубам. Великолепный у вас корабль — "Страж Бездны" с ним рядом не стоял. Но я все равно скучаю по той старой посудине..."

traits.locale_text: "Your helmsman, Ravor, showed me around the decks in his spare time. A wonderful voidship you have — the Watchman of the Abyss couldn't hold a candle to it. I still miss that old boat though..."
"Your helmsman, Ravor, showed me around the decks in his spare time. A wonderful voidship you have — the Watchman of the Abyss couldn't hold a candle to it. I still miss that old boat though..."
"Your helmsman, Ravor, showed me around the decks in his spare time. A wonderful voidship you have — the Watchman of the Abyss couldn't hold a candle to it. I still miss that old rig though..."
"Your helmsman, Ravor, showed me around the decks in his spare time. A wonderful voidship you have — the Watchman of the Abyss couldn't hold a candle to it. I still miss that old rig though..."
"Your helmsman, Ravor, showed me around the decks in his spare time. A wonderful voidship you have — the Watchman of the Abyss couldn't hold a candle to it. I still miss that old rig though..."

languages.text: “您的舵手雷沃闲暇的时候带我参观了甲板。您的虚空舰可真不赖，就连深渊守望者号都比不上它。不过，我还是很怀念那艘老破船……”
languages.original_text: "Your helmsman, Ravor, showed me around the decks in his spare time. A wonderful voidship you have — the Watchman of the Abyss couldn't hold a candle to it. I still miss that old rig though..."

traits.locale_text: “您的舵手雷沃闲暇的时候带我参观了甲板。您的虚空舰可真不赖，就连深渊守望者号都比不上它。不过，我还是很怀念那艘老破船……”

languages.text: « Ravor, votre timonier, m'a fait visiter les ponts durant son temps libre. C'est un magnifique vaisseau que vous avez là. Le Veilleur de l'Abysse ne lui arrive pas à la cheville, mais il me manque tout de même... »
languages.original_text: "Your helmsman, Ravor, showed me around the decks in his spare time. A wonderful voidship you have — the Watchman of the Abyss couldn't hold a candle to it. I still miss that old rig though..."

traits.locale_text: « Ravor, votre timonier, m'a fait visiter les ponts durant son temps libre. C'est un magnifique vaisseau que vous avez là. Le Veilleur de l'Abysse ne lui arrive pas à la cheville, mais il me manque tout de même... »

languages.text: 「空き時間に、操舵手のラヴォアがデッキを案内してくれました。素晴らしいヴォイドシップですな。深淵の番人など足元にも及びませんでした。あの古い艤装は今でも恋しいですがね…」
languages.original_text: "Your helmsman, Ravor, showed me around the decks in his spare time. A wonderful voidship you have — the Watchman of the Abyss couldn't hold a candle to it. I still miss that old rig though..."

traits.locale_text: 「空き時間に、操舵手のラヴォアがデッキを案内してくれました。素晴らしいヴォイドシップですな。深淵の番人など足元にも及びませんでした。あの古い艤装は今でも恋しいですがね…」

languages.text: «Su maestro timonel, Ravor, me enseñó las diversas cubiertas en su tiempo libre. Tiene una nave del vacío maravillosa, nada que ver con el Centinela del Vacío. Aun así, echo de menos la vieja bañera...».
languages.original_text: "Your helmsman, Ravor, showed me around the decks in his spare time. A wonderful voidship you have — the Watchman of the Abyss couldn't hold a candle to it. I still miss that old rig though..."

traits.locale_text: «Su maestro timonel, Ravor, me enseñó las diversas cubiertas en su tiempo libre. Tiene una nave del vacío maravillosa, nada que ver con el Centinela del Vacío. Aun así, echo de menos la vieja bañera...».

languages.text: "Euer Steuermann, Ravor, hat mich in seiner Freizeit über die Decks geführt. Ein wunderbares Raumschiff habt Ihr — die Wächter des Abgrunds könnte ihm nicht das Wasser reichen. Aber ich vermisse das alte Ding ..."
languages.original_text: "Your helmsman, Ravor, showed me around the decks in his spare time. A wonderful voidship you have — the Watchman of the Abyss couldn't hold a candle to it. I still miss that old rig though..."

traits.locale_text: "Euer Steuermann, Ravor, hat mich in seiner Freizeit über die Decks geführt. Ein wunderbares Raumschiff habt Ihr — die Wächter des Abgrunds könnte ihm nicht das Wasser reichen. Aber ich vermisse das alte Ding ..."

languages.text: "Serdümeniniz Ravor, boş vaktinde bana güverteleri gezdirdi. Şahane bir uçsuz geminiz var. Boşluğun Gözcüsü, yanına bile yaklaşamaz. Gerçi o hurda yığınını hâlâ özlüyorum..."
languages.original_text: "Your helmsman, Ravor, showed me around the decks in his spare time. A wonderful voidship you have — the Watchman of the Abyss couldn't hold a candle to it. I still miss that old rig though..."
